title: 连接中止:handleDisconnection() called twice
author: 副科级
txt_content:
用官服forge核心开不会出现handleDisconnection() called twice
但是换了cat就会出现这种问题 玩家一进服停一会就这样 time out handleDisconnection() called twice

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
显示handleDisconnection() called twice 或 Timed out的优化方法
